name: Main Algorithms
description: This repository contains the main algorithms problems and the most commom softwares made by any developer in multiple languages. The motivation behind this project is explore and implement algorithms.

name: Bachman CRUD
description: Charles William Bachman III was an American computer scientist. He was particularly known for his work in the early development of database management systems, This is a live-server with a CRUD system saved on memory.

name: Discord Alerts
description: This tool has the focus to help developers to implement notifications and alerts for their discord servers. The idea is call decorators on functions that needs monitoration.

name: Faraday Web Server
description: Michael Faraday was an English scientist who contributed to the study of electromagnetism and electrochemistry. This project explore how to build your own web server.

name: CSE212-HW
description: This repository is a step-by-step to learn data structures on C#

name: Dotfiles
description: A clean, efficient, and minimalist desktop environment centered around XMonad window manager. This setup emphasizes keyboard-driven workflows, minimalism, and productivity.
